name: CornerMask
desc: The object for creating rounded corners.

items.name: bottomLeft
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the bottom-left corner should be masked.

items.name: bottomRight
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the bottom-right corner should be masked.

items.name: curve
items.desc: NoteAvailable in iOS 13, iPadOS 13, and macOS 10.15.The type of curve to use for rendering the maskâ€™s corner. Valid values:circular. Creates a rounded corner.continuous. Creates a continuous corner.

items.name: radius
items.desc: A supported unit or number that describes the radius of the corners in points. Corner radius cannot exceed half the component width or height, whichever is smaller.

items.name: topLeft
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the top-left corner should be masked.

items.name: topRight
items.desc: A Boolean that indicates whether the top-right corner should be masked.

items.name: type
items.desc: The type of mask. The value is always corners.
